name: One surety sufficient, when
text: A single surety is sufficient, if the surety offers cash, a credit card authorization, stocks, bonds, or real property in accordance with section 804-11.5, otherwise there shall be two or more sureties. [PC 1869, c 50, §9; RL 1925, §3987; RL 1935, §5441; RL 1945, §10741; RL 1955, §256-11; HRS §709-11; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 139, §6]
